successStories.name: Sai Krishna
successStories.successStory: Joining 10000 coders transformed me into a skilled React developer, fulfilling my dream. Thanks to their training along with mentor sessions and doubt clearance, I gained valuable knowledge and expertise

successStories.name: Snehalatha
successStories.successStory: 10000 coders transformed me into a confident girl and improved my communication skills. Now, I know a lot about building websites and apps. I'm thankful for the straightforward lessons that made coding easier for me.

successStories.name: Amrutha
successStories.successStory: I got better at talking and coding. Now, I know how to make the front end of websites. This helped me a lot and made me better overall.

successStories.name: Yashwanth
successStories.successStory: The mock interviews are really helpful. I always get positive feedback, and they prepare me well for real interviews. Thanks to these mocks, I feel confident and got placed in a company.

successStories.name: Jahnavi
successStories.successStory: Thanks to 10000 Coders, I've become a skilled front-end developer. Their training and projects improved my problem-solving abilities, providing practical experience. They played a crucial role in shaping my confidence.

successStories.name: Ambika
successStories.successStory: Internship was key in training as it involved real projects, offering hands-on experience and valuable knowledge. The practical learning gained during this phase was immensely helpful for personal and professional growth.

curriculum.overview: Master HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap for responsive web design, while learning to manage code with GitHub and deploy on AWS. Improve communication and aptitude skills, complete a mini project, participate in a mock interview, attend coding workshops, and experience a sample drive for real-world placement preparation.

Build proficiency in JavaScript and SQL for database management, while working on two mini projects to enhance practical skills. Improve problem-solving abilities through coding workshops and prepare for placements with second mock interviews.

Focus on creating responsive web designs that adapt to different devices. Learn to develop fluid grids, use media queries, and optimize images. Implement mobile-first design strategies and understand progressive enhancement for a better user experience.

Develop expertise in React.js, Node.js, and Redux while working on a major project to demonstrate your skills. Enhance problem-solving through coding workshops, improve aptitude, and prepare for placements with three mock interviews.

Enhance your profile to align with job requirements for smoother screening and better visibility. Prepare for stand-up calls and live interviews by refining your skills and practicing relevant scenarios.

Bonus pre-recording sessions include comprehensive content on Java, Python, SQL, AWS, Node.js, and React, along with focused training on problem-solving and aptitude to strengthen technical and analytical skills for placements.

QuoteCardData.text: Exceptional trainers, practical learning, and real-time internships set 10000 Coders apart.
The training and support from 10000 Coders transformed my knowledge, leading to 2 placement offers.
I thank 10000 Coders for making me a confident developer. It's a great place to learn different technologies.
Mentor's dedication ensured confident achievement of goals by overcoming challenges successfully.

JourneyContent.title: Month 1: Foundation Building
points: Structure web content, basic elements for effective webpage development.
Implementing responsive and visually appealing designs using the Bootstrap
Version control, collaboration strategies using Git.
Boosting confidence through effective communication, teamwork
JourneyContent.outcome: Master the foundational skills of HTML, CSS, Git, and Bootstrap, while gaining confidence through communication sessions; culminate the Month with a comprehensive web project and a mock interview, setting the stage for Full Stack success.

JourneyContent.title: Month 2: JavaScript Mastery
points: Mastering the fundamentals of JavaScript, including variables, functions, control flow, and DOM manipulation for dynamic web development.
Database querying and manipulation skills using SQL, enabling effective data management within web applications.
Enhancing problem-solving abilities through interactive sessions, focusing on algorithmic thinking and logical reasoning
JourneyContent.outcome: Excel in JavaScript and SQL proficiency, sharpen problem-solving skills, and showcase your capabilities through hands-on projects and mock interviews, propelling yourself toward Full Stack expertise

JourneyContent.title: Month 3 : React.js Advancement
points: Mastering the art of building dynamic and responsive user interfaces using React.js, leveraging components and state management
State management at scale, utilizing Redux to efficiently manage the state of your React applications.
Integrating HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Redux, and React skills in a mini project, showcasing your ability to create interactive and stateful web applications.
JourneyContent.outcome: Master React.js and Redux for dynamic web development, demonstrate proficiency in a multifaceted mini project combining HTML, CSS, JS, Redux, and React, and undergo a comprehensive mock interview

JourneyContent.title: Mastering Redux with Confidence
points: Understand the principles of Redux for centralized state.
Develop effective communication skills in a tech environment.
JourneyContent.outcome: Apply your knowledge in a hands-on project, demonstrating proficiency in Redux and fostering effective team communication.

JourneyContent.title: Nailing Interviews with Finesse
points: Learn strategies for technical and behavioral interview success.
Craft compelling responses to common interview questions.
Receive personalized feedback and performance evaluations.
JourneyContent.outcome: Perfect your interview performance with hands-on practice, expert feedback, and enhanced communication skills.

JourneyContent.title: Placement Readiness Training
points: Craft an impactful and tailored tech resume.
Polish interview skills with focused feedback.
JourneyContent.outcome: Step confidently into the tech industry with the skills and connections needed for a successful career.
